tool_description: Plans GPS collar deployments including animal selection, deployment locations, timing considerations, and field team coordination.

deployment_location.description: Geographic location or site name for deployment

latitude.description: Deployment site latitude in decimal degrees (-90 to 90)

longitude.description: Deployment site longitude in decimal degrees (-180 to 180)

animal_age_class.description: Target age class: adult, juvenile, or mixed

capture_method.description: Planned capture method: net_gun, dart, trap, or drive_net

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be -90 to 90, longitude must be -180 to 180.
Invalid deployment date: Provide a valid future date in ISO 8601 format.
Collar count out of range: Number of collars must be between 1-50.
Invalid age class: Use adult, juvenile, or mixed.
Invalid capture method: Use net_gun, dart, trap, or drive_net.
Species not supported: Provide a recognized wildlife species name.
usage: Specify species, deployment_location, coordinates, deployment_date, and number_of_collars. Optionally set animal_age_class and capture_method. Returns deployment plan with logistics and recommendations.

deployment_id.description: Unique identifier for the deployment plan

recommended_team_size.description: Recommended number of field team members
